ranked_diseases.explanation: Classic presentation with intellectual disability, developmental delay, thick eyebrows, hypertelorism, short stature, and hand abnormalities. Macrodontia is less common but can occur.
Features intellectual disability, developmental delay, hypertelorism, and short stature. Thick eyebrows and dental anomalies including macrodontia have been reported.
Presents with intellectual disability, developmental delay, thick eyebrows, and hand abnormalities. Dental anomalies and short stature are common features.
Characterized by intellectual disability, developmental delay, hypertelorism, and distinctive hand abnormalities. Dental anomalies and short stature are typical.
Features macrodontia as a cardinal sign, along with intellectual disability, developmental delay, short stature, and hypertelorism. Hand abnormalities less prominent.
Presents with intellectual disability, developmental delay, thick eyebrows, short stature, and hypertelorism. Hand abnormalities and dental issues can occur.
Characterized by short stature, intellectual disability, delayed speech, and distinctive facial features. Hand abnormalities and dental anomalies are less common.
